tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE energy_trading_platform (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    buyer_id INT NOT NULL,
    seller_id INT NOT NULL,
    energy_amount FLOAT NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    CONSTRAINT fk_user_id FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE energy_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    producer_id INT NOT NULL,
    consumer_id INT NOT NULL,
    energy_amount INT NOT NULL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE energy_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    producer_id INT,
    consumer_id INT,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    energy_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_producer FOREIGN KEY (producer_id) REFERENCES energy_producers(producer_id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_consumer FOREIGN KEY (consumer_id) REFERENCES energy_consumers(consumer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE transaction_history (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_type ENUM('buy', 'sell') NOT NULL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    energy_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    user_id INT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_user FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);
